member.name: T:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.IdfFlag
member.summary: Specifies IDF (Inverse Document Frequency) calculation options for term ranking, determining how term frequency across documents impacts search relevance.

member.name: F:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.IdfFlag.Normalized
member.summary: BM25 normalized IDF: Applies logarithmic scaling, penalizing frequent terms by calculating idf = log((N - n + 1) / n), where N is total documents and n is matches.

member.name: F:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.IdfFlag.Plain
member.summary: Plain IDF: Uses basic logarithmic scaling (idf = log(N / n)), ensuring no penalty for common terms; suitable for relevance ranking without frequency-based downranking.

member.name: F:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.IdfFlag.TfidfNormalized
member.summary: Normalized TF-IDF: Divides IDF by query term count for balanced scores in [0,1] range, reducing excessive influence of high-frequency terms.

member.name: F:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.IdfFlag.TfidfUnnormalized
member.summary: Unnormalized TF-IDF: Retains raw IDF score without division by query term count, preventing score drift in multi-term queries.

member.name: T:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.JiebaMode
member.summary: Specifies the Jieba segmentation mode used for tokenizing Chinese text in queries, enabling different levels of precision and segment coverage.

member.name: F:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.JiebaMode.Accurate
member.summary: Accurate mode: Prioritizes segmentation accuracy, suitable for standard queries where precise token boundaries are required.

member.name: F:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.JiebaMode.Full
member.summary: Full mode: Maximizes segmentation to cover all possible terms, useful for broad search coverage or when indexing requires comprehensive segmentation.

member.name: F:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.JiebaMode.Search
member.summary: Search mode: Optimized for search queries, breaking down long phrases to match smaller segments, enhancing search relevance in phrase-based queries.

member.name: T:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.RankerOption
member.summary: Represents the ranking options available for ManticoreSearch, used to define the scoring algorithms for matching documents in queries.

member.name: F:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.RankerOption.ProximityBm25
member.summary: Combines proximity with BM25 ranking, enhancing results by factoring both term frequency and positional relevance.

member.name: F:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.RankerOption.Bm25
member.summary: BM25 ranking based solely on term frequency and inverse document frequency, providing classic relevance scoring.

member.name: F:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.RankerOption.None
member.summary: Disables ranking, resulting in a binary match/no-match for query terms without additional scoring.

member.name: F:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.RankerOption.Wordcount
member.summary: Ranks based on term count in the document, suitable for basic relevance where frequency is a primary factor.

member.name: F:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.RankerOption.Proximity
member.summary: Uses proximity-only scoring, giving higher weight to documents with closer term matches.

member.name: F:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.RankerOption.Matchany
member.summary: Matches any term in the document without additional relevance weighting, useful for broad matches.

member.name: F:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.RankerOption.Fieldmask
member.summary: Uses a field mask for ranking, optimizing relevance based on specific indexed fields.

member.name: F:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.RankerOption.Sph04
member.summary: SPH04 algorithm-based ranking, a custom Manticore ranking model for balancing relevance with term distribution.

member.name: F:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.RankerOption.Expr
member.summary: Allows for custom ranking expressions, enabling fine-grained control over ranking based on document fields.

member.name: F:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.RankerOption.Export
member.summary: Exports ranking results, primarily used for testing and debugging scoring results.

member.name: T:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.SortMethod
member.summary: Specifies sorting methods available for ManticoreSearch, used to optimize query results sorting.

member.name: F:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.SortMethod.Pq
member.summary: Priority queue sorting, efficient for small to moderate result sets by prioritizing top results.

member.name: F:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.SortMethod.Kbuffer
member.summary: K-buffer sorting, suitable for handling larger result sets by maintaining a buffer of top K elements.

member.name: T:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.JoinType
member.summary: Specifies the type of join to be performed in a database query.

member.name: F:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.JoinType.Inner
member.summary: Represents an inner join. Only returns rows where there is a match in both tables.

member.name: F:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Requests.JoinType.Left
member.summary: Represents a left join. Returns all rows from the left table, and the matched rows from the right table. If there is no match, the result is NULL on the right side.

member.name: P:ManticoreSearch.Provider.Models.Responses.ProfileQuery.Switches
member.summary: Displays the number of times the query engine changed to the given state. These are merely logical engine state switches and not any OS level context switches or function calls (although some sections might actually map to function calls), and they do not have any direct effect on performance. In a sense, the number of switches is just the number of times the respective instrumentation point was hit.
